languages.text: "Пусть я и не одобряю мерзкой привычки таскать в свите богохульных ксеносов, я должна признать, что их присутствие не затенит ярости, с которой пылает твоя вера".
"While I cannot approve of your detestable habit of keeping ungodly xenos in your retinue, I will admit that their presence does not dim the fury with which your devotion burns."
languages.original_text: "Пусть я и не одобряю мерзкой привычки таскать в свите богохульных ксеносов, я должна признать, что их присутствие не затенит ярости, с которой пылает твоя вера".

traits.locale_text: "While I cannot approve of your detestable habit of keeping ungodly xenos in your retinue, I will admit that their presence does not dim the fury with which your devotion burns."
"While I cannot approve of your detestable habit of keeping ungodly xenos in your retinue, I will admit that their presence does not dim the fury with which your devotion burns."
"While I cannot approve of your detestable habit of keeping ungodly xenos in your retinue, I will admit that their presence does not dim the fury with which your devotion burns."
"While I cannot approve of your detestable habit of keeping ungodly xenos in your retinue, I will admit that their presence does not dim the fury with which your devotion burns."
"While I cannot approve of your detestable habit of keeping ungodly xenos in your retinue, I will admit that their presence does not dim the fury with which your devotion burns."

languages.text: "Ich kann Eure abscheuliche Gewohnheit, gottlose Xenos in Eurem Gefolge zu dulden, zwar nicht billigen, aber ich gebe zu, dass ihre Gegenwart die Wut nicht schmälert, die Eure Hingabe nährt."
languages.original_text: "While I cannot approve of your detestable habit of keeping ungodly xenos in your retinue, I will admit that their presence does not dim the fury with which your devotion burns."

traits.locale_text: "Ich kann Eure abscheuliche Gewohnheit, gottlose Xenos in Eurem Gefolge zu dulden, zwar nicht billigen, aber ich gebe zu, dass ihre Gegenwart die Wut nicht schmälert, die Eure Hingabe nährt."

languages.text: « Si je n'approuverai jamais cette habitude détestable que vous avez de garder des xénos impies dans votre entourage, je dois admettre que leur présence ne nuit en rien à la flamme vengeresse de votre dévotion. »
languages.original_text: "While I cannot approve of your detestable habit of keeping ungodly xenos in your retinue, I will admit that their presence does not dim the fury with which your devotion burns."

traits.locale_text: « Si je n'approuverai jamais cette habitude détestable que vous avez de garder des xénos impies dans votre entourage, je dois admettre que leur présence ne nuit en rien à la flamme vengeresse de votre dévotion. »

languages.text: 「不浄なる異種族を従者とし続けるというあなたの忌むべき慣習を認めることはできないが、その存在があなたの献身への熱を止めるものではないことは認めよう」
languages.original_text: "While I cannot approve of your detestable habit of keeping ungodly xenos in your retinue, I will admit that their presence does not dim the fury with which your devotion burns."

traits.locale_text: 「不浄なる異種族を従者とし続けるというあなたの忌むべき慣習を認めることはできないが、その存在があなたの献身への熱を止めるものではないことは認めよう」

languages.text: «Aunque no apruebo su deleznable costumbre de incluir a xenos impíos en su séquito, admito que su presencia no ensombrece la furia con la que arde su devoción».
languages.original_text: "While I cannot approve of your detestable habit of keeping ungodly xenos in your retinue, I will admit that their presence does not dim the fury with which your devotion burns."

traits.locale_text: «Aunque no apruebo su deleznable costumbre de incluir a xenos impíos en su séquito, admito que su presencia no ensombrece la furia con la que arde su devoción».

languages.text: “你允许不虔的异形担任你的随行人员。虽然我无法认同这令人鄙夷的做法，但我得承认，即便与他们为伍，你忠诚的烈焰也并没有丝毫黯淡。”
languages.original_text: "While I cannot approve of your detestable habit of keeping ungodly xenos in your retinue, I will admit that their presence does not dim the fury with which your devotion burns."

traits.locale_text: “你允许不虔的异形担任你的随行人员。虽然我无法认同这令人鄙夷的做法，但我得承认，即便与他们为伍，你忠诚的烈焰也并没有丝毫黯淡。”

languages.text: "Her ne kadar tanrı tanımaz iğrenç zenoları maiyetinde tutma alışkanlığını onaylamam mümkün olmasa da mevcudiyetlerinin, adanmışlığının hararetini azaltmadığını itiraf etmem gerek."
languages.original_text: "While I cannot approve of your detestable habit of keeping ungodly xenos in your retinue, I will admit that their presence does not dim the fury with which your devotion burns."
